thread.title: Sherrie Dee Miles
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Sherrie Dee Miles

author: Sherrie Dee Miles
title: Sherrie Dee Miles
text: Please offer more workout tops that cover the bottom. At least four women in my yoga class (all ages) asked me where I got my Teresa tank. They can't find tops to cover their bottoms. These women have nice figures. If I run to the store after class, I like my backside covered well.
